select product.* from ent_product product where product.sys_status = 1
and product.name like "%${keyword}%"
order by product_index
select product.* from ent_product product where product.sys_status = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ent_product ( id, name, scale, product_index, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{name}, #{scale}, #{product_index}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ent_product set name = #{name}, scale = #{scale}, product_index = #{product_index}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ent_product set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
